name: teira
text: does ray smuckles seriously only sleep on a twin? That's a bit of a let down.

name: unfun
text: Ray has many beds.

name: teira
text: I always sort of just assumed he'd have a size beyond king. A size simply named "Ray"

name: themolt
text: Many beds for many occasions.

name: featurelessvoid
text: A comment left by featurelessvoid was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nbgreene, ishuta, Thorfinn, nicklon)

name: atticusonline
text: The fact that I actually know a skinny-ass, dry-haired girl named Summer is terrifying and hilarious.

name: fermatprime
text: is she a "secret shopper" for a grocery store analysis chain?

name: atticusonline
text: That is something she would definitely do...also smoking the wrong end of a cigarette.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: "I assume you light the color-coded end, right?"

name: evolume
text: i'm sure i've mentioned this before but, my firm belief is that he sleeps on a twin so that if there is a hotty next to him, she has to get out or get busy...

name: dropkickpikachu
text: What a coincidence this is my strategy as well.

name: achilleselbow
text: This is my strategy also. It has nothing to do with the fact that the indented space in my tiny room only allows for a twin bed, or that I cannot afford a larger one.

name: thescrivener
text:
I'm 6'2" and I sleep on a full, even at a near-anorexic level I take up more than a twin bed by myself.
My strategy is that if you have enough space for yourself and a hottie, you need more hotties, not less space.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I like your style! Chubbie for you good sir!

name: spicyponyhead
text: I bought a king-sized bed, so there'd be room for 2 other people to sleep over. So far, this has worked well.

name: farqussus
text: Although we only ever see Ray wake up when he is hungover, I like to think he only sleeps in that bed when he's drunk. It's a small, bare bed in a small bare, spare bedroom that Beef has coined 'Wallow World".

name: son_of_selleck
text: you have to cherish ray's sleeping face.

name: omnidope
text: His nose injury may have given him a deviated septum.

name: imitationcrab
text: A comment left by imitationcrab was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nbgreene, daniel_grieff, Thorfinn, pulkbaby)

name: odei
text: Ray's arm is hell of skinny. (Damn, that should not worry me so much.) Have the kebab, Ray, get some meat back on them bones.

name: odei
text: Assetbar suggestion: have pop-ups asking "Have you had plenty of sleep?" "Are you intoxicated?" before letting a user post.

name: k_buttsworthe
text: "Don't chew that pen you dont know where its been"

name: k_buttsworthe
text: "when are you going to start dinner its almost 8 o'clock"

name: phoenixultima
text: "your opinions really aren't that important"

name: neonfreon
text: A comment left by neonfreon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, straw, taiiga, madnes, fineoakstructure, Methadone)

name: songbirdspectre
text: "look over there!"

name: gormster
text: "fetch the ball, fetch it... good boy"

name: jackparsons
text: "don't be a cock to people"

name: odei
text: "The children are worried because they never see you at home anymore."

name: odei
text: "You forgot to pick up the kids from school yesterday."

name: odei
text: "It's 11pm! What time do you- you stink of bourbon!"

name: alzuna
text: "Shouldn't you be working right now?"

name: stimpy
text: "Get back in the kitchen and make me some PIE!"

name: awko
text: "Get your hand off your face and sit up straight."

name: spicyponyhead
text: Daddy drinks because you cry.

name: taskmaster
text: Who needs assetbar for this one? When I read it, I imagined someone yelling at Roast Beef.

name: spinynorman
text: We all know Onstad could rake in thousands of dollars by letting dating site popups advertise on Assetbar. It's only though his favor that we are not tempted by the smiling 19-year old talking on the phone while playfully lying on her bed with massive words CALL ME! underneath.

name: pyromancer
text: No kebab.  Ray would totally chunder the kebab.

name: gormster
text: I think that is the first time I have ever heard anyone use the word 'chunder' in context. This is significant since it is apparently slang native to my homeland.

name: radishes
text: His arm models the idea of a real cat's anatomy rather well I think.

name: dccate
text: Skinny but still strong enough to rip a man's face off, then turn a cowboy into cowboy sauce .

name: spicyponyhead
text: hissssssssssssssssss

name: padijun
text: cut to boody marys at noon

name: solobuttons
text:
Eggs B and a Bloody, dogg.

Actually that's how I started my day today.

name: mrclarinet
text: I am at a gas station

name: stuart
text: The best part of waking up.

name: blastradius
text: We know what he thought about last night ... but what did he think about today? The dude has a million crazy schemes that he isn't wasting thoughts on anonymous chicks during the daylight hours.

name: shmuckeles
text: Ray sleeps with his shades on. What a star.

name: awko
text: Sleeps with em on or forgets to take them off before collapsing onto his bed?

name: aperson
text: I had an experience similar to Ray once, when I woke up in the morning. Luckily "THERE WAS NO LADY PE TEACHER THERE" .

name: jackparsons
text: A whole new perspective on Ms. Winslet.

name: thommy_h
text: Hmmm...Ray's inner-monologue appears to obey the same laws of punctuation and style as Roast Beef's actual dialogue. Is this significant?

name: methadone
text: it's because his head is pounding so hard he can barely hear his thoughts

name: gage
text: Ray doesn't remember emailing Téodor a link to a "Chicks with Dicks" website at 4 am.

name: aperson
text: The dude is connecting the dots so we dont have to. Applause.

name: grayfox
text: RotaryResurrection is that you?

name: behka
text: Ray can be a simple man at times.  he has simple needs: no skinny ass girls with dry hair named Summer.  i believe today has met those needs for Ray.

name: pitseleh
text: I think we've all had thoughts similar to Ray's at one time in our lives. God knows I have. Sheesh.

name: grayfox
text: I woke up one time and thought I was blind.  Turned out it was just 5am and I was facing a wall.

name: supergeorgina
text: I woke up twice one morning and thought I was colorblind!  It was actually just a gray New England day.

name: honesttom
text: I once woke up convinced it was the 1950s, and therefore not worth switching the TV on.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I woke up convinced I could send a clone of myself to take a shower and go to work, so that I could continue sleeping.

name: littlefatdog
text: I once woke up convinced that I was still dreaming, and went through the day doing ridiculous things and fearing no consequences.

name: twoply
text: I once woke up with a spoon in my mouth, a bowl of cereal in my hand, Skinemax on the tv, and my parents screaming at me.

name: geesycreesy
text: Weird; the same thing happened to me when I was kid. No joke.

name: tha_snazzle
text: I once woke up and spent the first five minutes of my day trying to turn off the alarm telekinetically.

name: porquechutzpah
text: one time i woke up to the sounds of bela fleck and steve martin playing the banjo. the day was sunny and temperate, and nothing could bring my mood down.

name: le_chien_manquee
text: one time i had a nosebleed during my drunken sleep and must've been lying on my back and when i woke up, padded into the bathroom and looked at the mirror, i thought my eye had fallen out and i actually screamed.  not my proudest moment

name: gormster
text: it's all a conspiracy.

name: croi
text:
It's 1 am and I can't stop giggling at this.

(Germanely: My mother does not know that Achewood exists; it follows that she does not know I read it when I'm alone in my room in the wee smalls. My mother is developing the opinion that I am mad.)

name: odei
text: Weird, sometimes I kinda wake up but I'm still dreaming and I think I'm getting ready for college but I'm not so when I do get up I am double exhausted.

name: thisisaspace
text: i've rarely had a day where i don't feel that way.

name: ttagxamm
text: One morning I woke up, put my bathing suit on, sleep-drove to the gym, removed my bathing suit for a pre-swim shower, and walked to the pool bare-ass naked before realizing where the hell I was.

name: croi
text: How far was the gym?

name: ttagxamm
text:
Oh, I dunno, four or five miles? I had my wife in the car to prod me back awake.

Caught a lucky break in that the smaller pool off the locker rooms was unlit and empty, and an even luckier break that none of the cleaning staff was in the laundry room I passed on my way to poolside.

name: apatfan
text: I love that shish kebabs are only delicious at appropriate times, and are otherwise gross.  Also, he can't even allow himself a decent amount of toast.  That's how early it is.

name: rumblefish
text: Don't be forcing your notion of what constitutes a "decent" amount of toast on us.

name: stevepants
text: oh god I can't wait for the beef installment of this!

name: thommy_h
text: I'm holding out for Phillipe's.

name: stuart
text: HI! -> YES!

name: nonentity
text:
I woke up to a chick named Summer once. She was not skinny-ass, either.

Let me just tell you, that is the worst of times.

name: andrew_
text: Unless of course he's retarded.

name: straw
text: I am just so pleased that this is turning into a mini-arc.  It is what the doctor suggested.

name: evolume
text: i went to high school with a skinny ass chick with dry hair named Summer.  she had F'd up Jewel-teeth but she was still pretty cute.

name: robobogle
text:
John?!? Is that really you?!?

John why do you hate my teeth they are very pretty.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: all the better to nom you with...

name: spicyponyhead
text: Was she a blonde? Was this in California? (not me, but this is apparently a Thing)

name: paperboy_2000
text: Some kids hide under their blanket from imaginary monsters. Ray hides under his blanket from imaginary secret shoppers that he may or may not have boned. If I can't see her, she can't spoon me!

name: gormster
text: It is impossible to spoon someone that can see you.

name: jaredwilde
text: This man speaks truth.

name: steerpike66
text: I find that if you get drunk and eat something heavy and kebab-ish late at night, then crash, you wake up craving more meats on sticks.

name: neonfreon
text: A comment left by neonfreon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, Zefiel, onion_lightly, Sargasm, Mastronaut)

name: onion_lightly
text: If you're gonna be a dick at least make an effort, dude.

name: neonfreon
text: A comment left by neonfreon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, ocarinak, Mastronaut, dj)

text: Fuck. Checkmate.

name: dandiep
text: A comment left by dandiep was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nbgreene, songbirdspectre, Rawk5tar)

name: projectyl
text:
None before me have echoed an excellent sound effect, and so it the Rule of Acheworld that I must. It is a void to be filled.

PHOOoooooo.

It is the sound of relief, of release, of a head hitting the pillow from which it was jerkily divorced a few seconds earlier. It is today's Best Sound. Come to the podium, PHOOoooooo.

name: plezure
text: Oh man. That is freaky. I did wake up to a skinny-ass check the other day. Only her name was Frank, not Summer.

name: miku224
text: Sorry for an unrelated post, but can anyone remind me of the name of the firefox addon that lets you view full tooltips?

name: schnappm
text: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1715

name: miku224
text: Much obliged.

name: mome
text: A comment left by mome was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nbgreene, gormster, Son_Of_Selleck)

name: woodenteeth
text: I do enjoy the fact that this comic attracts and possibly educates people on how to make a funny comment. That's all we need on here really. Extended funnies. Top work kids.

name: geesycreesy
text:
Ray's control of his anxiety is great: once the danger of post-coitus cuddles is out of sight, he just exhales into sleep.
In that same situation, I usually have to do a shot, then jog outside, and then do two more shots. It's what I call my Eye of Tiger regiment.

name: skiddyfisk
text: I hope this becomes a series like the flowcharts.

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Dang I am eagerly awaiting the next strip. I suppose Philippe is doing some last-minute fact checking about the speed of industrial bologna slicers or some such.

Anyone else worried about Rod Huggins after Nice Pete's blog entry? Pete may be one "caramel thighs" from a little one-on-one with Rod.

name: miku224
text: I too am rather concerned for Rod.  But then, I'm rather concerned for everyone that Nice Pete encounters.  He's a dangerous dude.

name: tim88
text: For once, Ray is happy to still be hella klondike.

name: blastradius
text: Apparently lunch in California is around 4PM. Or later. When is the new strip going up?

name: zefiel
text:
Chris is such a tease.


/Not Retardo.

text: i want my imaginary money back. juuuuuust kidding.

text: today's strip went up on time, it just happens to be exactly the same as yesterday's

name: sargasm
text: "California Lunchtime" is when you do a heavy shift of drinking on Friday night and get really hungry at like 3 in the morning.  But that's fine, 'cause that's okay.

text: "California Lunchtime" is Monday.

text:
We sit and we wait
We try so hard not to cry

text: I would like to wake up next to Summer Glau, even if her hair was dry that day.

text: I would love to wake up next to a skinny-ass chick with dry hair. Those are my favorite kind of chicks!

No one's said it?

Ray sleeps in his glasses.
